Title: Provides that any review of apportionment by the legislature shall be brought in the supreme court of Albany county
Summary: Provides that any review of apportionment by the legislature shall be brought in the supreme court of Albany county; provides that such action must be commenced within fourteen days after the apportionment at issue becomes a law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 773 of the laws of 1911 relating to providing for a procedure for the prompt review of an apportionment by the legislature or other body, in relation to bringing any such review to the supreme court of Albany county
